data.timestampComment: 主要案情标识号分词时间戳（人员）
data.regexSql: select GZ,CODE,LX from b_ypgj_bshzz_wybshgl where lx not in ('车牌号','身份证') and deleteflag != '1' and state='1' order by code
data.noNumRegexSql: select GZ,CODE,LX,decode(CODE,'001','cn.sinobest.traverse.analyzer.regular.SFZHRegularConvertor','') as ANALYZERCLASS from b_ypgj_bshzz_wybshgl where lx in ('车牌号','身份证') and deleteflag != '1' and state='1' order by code
data.detailQuery: select /*+rule*/'ry' as zymc,x.rylx as rylx,r.ajbh as ajbh,(select ajmc from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = r.ajbh) as ajmc,(select systemid from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = r.ajbh) as ajid,r.systemid as systemid,x.zjhm as zjhm,x.LXDH as lxfs from b_asj_baszqt x,b_asj_rysaqk r where r.rybh = x.systemid and x.LASTUPDATEDTIME>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and x.LASTUPDATEDTIME is not null
data.fullQuery: select /*+rule*/'ry' as zymc,x.rylx as rylx,r.ajbh as ajbh,(select ajmc from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = r.ajbh) as ajmc,(select systemid from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = r.ajbh) as ajid,r.systemid as systemid,x.zjhm as zjhm,x.LXDH as lxfs from b_asj_baszqt x,b_asj_rysaqk r where r.rybh = x.systemid

data.timestampComment: 主要案情标识号分词时间戳（嫌疑人）
data.regexSql: select GZ,CODE,LX from b_ypgj_bshzz_wybshgl where lx not in ('车牌号','身份证') and deleteflag != '1' and state='1' order by code
data.noNumRegexSql: select GZ,CODE,LX from b_ypgj_bshzz_wybshgl where lx in ('车牌号','身份证') and deleteflag != '1' and state='1' order by code
data.detailQuery: select /*+rule*/'xyr' as zymc,'05' rylx,r.ajbh as ajbh,(select ajmc from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = r.ajbh) as ajmc,(select systemid from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = r.ajbh) as ajid,r.systemid as systemid,x.zjhm as zjhm,x.wfqk as wfqk from b_asj_xyrdj x,b_asj_rysaqk r where r.rybh = x.systemid and x.LASTUPDATEDTIME>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and x.LASTUPDATEDTIME is not null
data.fullQuery: select /*+rule*/'xyr' as zymc,'05' rylx,r.ajbh as ajbh,(select ajmc from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = r.ajbh) as ajmc,(select systemid from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = r.ajbh) as ajid,r.systemid as systemid,x.zjhm as zjhm,x.wfqk as wfqk from b_asj_xyrdj x,b_asj_rysaqk r where r.rybh = x.systemid

data.timestampComment: 主要案情标识号分词时间戳（物品）
data.regexSql: select GZ,CODE,LX from b_ypgj_bshzz_wybshgl where lx not in ('车牌号','身份证') and deleteflag != '1' and state='1' order by code
data.noNumRegexSql: select GZ,CODE,LX from b_ypgj_bshzz_wybshgl where lx in ('车牌号','身份证') and deleteflag != '1' and state='1' order by code
data.detailQuery: select 'wp' as zymc,decode(w.wpxz,'02','05','03','05','01','01','99') as rylx,systemid,wpgg,wptz,tzms,(select z.systemid from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = w.ajbh and rownum=1) as ajid,ajbh,(select z.ajmc from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = w.ajbh and rownum=1) as ajmc from B_ASJ_WP w where w.LASTUPDATEDTIME>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and LASTUPDATEDTIME is not null
data.fullQuery: select 'wp' as zymc,decode(w.wpxz,'02','05','03','05','01','01','99') as rylx,systemid,wpgg,wptz,tzms,(select z.systemid from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = w.ajbh and rownum=1) as ajid,ajbh,(select z.ajmc from b_asj_aj z where z.ajbh = w.ajbh and rownum=1) as ajmc from B_ASJ_WP w

data.timestampComment: 主要案情标识号分词时间戳（新）
data.regexSql: select GZ,CODE,LX,'' as ANALYZERCLASS from b_ypgj_bshzz_wybshgl where lx not in ('车牌号','身份证') and deleteflag != '1' and state='1' order by code
data.noNumRegexSql: select GZ,CODE,LX,decode(CODE,'001','cn.sinobest.traverse.analyzer.regular.SFZHRegularConvertor','') as ANALYZERCLASS from b_ypgj_bshzz_wybshgl where lx in ('车牌号','身份证') and deleteflag != '1' and state='1' order by code
data.detailQuery: select 'zaj' as zymc,(select RESERVATION07 from b_asj_jq j where j.ajbh = t.ajbh and rownum=1) jqms,(select body from b_asj_bl b where b.ajbh = t.ajbh and rownum=1) blxx,systemid as ajid,zyaq,ajbh,ajmc,'99' rylx from B_ASJ_AJ t where t.ajbh is not null and t.LASTUPDATEDTIME>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and LASTUPDATEDTIME is not null
data.fullQuery: select 'zaj' as zymc,(select RESERVATION07 from b_asj_jq j where j.ajbh = t.ajbh and rownum=1) jqms,(select body from b_asj_bl b where b.ajbh = t.ajbh and rownum=1) blxx,systemid as ajid,zyaq,ajbh,ajmc,'99' rylx from B_ASJ_AJ t
